mainText:
You don't know me Mr Jobs but I, a 17 year old boy followed the beauty of your work.. I wish you could have lived longer. The world loved your work, your ideas and inventions flowed out of your brilliant brain like the waves in a river.
I hope you passed peacefully and I hope, wherever you are you continue to make the world a better place.
The billions of people in this mac filled globe bless you Steve Jobs.
Love
        The 
People Of
The World... 

may you rest in peace.

Steve Jobs, your family will always stay close to you no matter where heaven takes you, no matter how far you go your family and your world is with... you.
author: Ben
